sentence.text: Finally, by immunohistochemical staining of primary breast tissue microarrays we find that DNA repair/histone H3-K9 demethylation/negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II complex subunits are frequently overexpressed in primary breast cancer cases in a correlative manner.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Taken together, these data open venues for exploring the possibility that sporadic breast cancer patients with EMSY amplification might benefit from epigenetic combination therapy targeting both the histone H3-K9 demethylation demethylase and histone deacetylases.
